title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-10.2 - Unsafe atmosphere
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-10.2 - Unsafe atmosphere

State Regulations

An atmosphere in which exhaust gases are visible or
create irritating or nauseous fumes shall be presumed to contain such gases in
a concentration tending to injure health. No contrary presumption shall obtain
by reason of the absence of such visibility or of such fumes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
23-10.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
